## Origin

## Insertion

## Innervation
[Suprascapular nerve {{< var ref-suprascapular-nerve.roots >}}]({{< var ref-suprascapular-nerve.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action
Initiates abduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
